summary: I have now fixed the magicka cost so it costs nothing . This spell is again only obtainable through console commands until I work out a good place to put it or sell it .
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION - Have you ever wanted to kill a lot of things really fast with your magic but found normal spells not good enough then this is the mod for you!!!

___________________________________________________________________________________________

This is my first mod , and I a'm new to the creation kit so this mod isn't too much but I hope you like it , and if you want feel free to post what you want me to add :D.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Update News:
-New spells
-Fixed spell cost
-Better Damage

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Damage:
The spell's do 80000 damage per second so it is able to kill a lot of things really fast , and the new lightning spell should make people disintegrate .

____________________________________________________________________________________________
How to get it:
You may now buy it from vendors if the update worked correctly . If bought it will cost (around) 1000 gold as it is an OP spell , and I wouldn't think it fair to give it away for free.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Animation:
I have edited the image so now you don't have to see the normal fire animation but the invisibility spell's effect so it looks better when you go to find it in your magic tab . Keep in mind that when in hand it still looks like the normal animation for fire . Also the new spells have the normal textures but they will be changed in the next update.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Plans:
- Now I plan to make it a quest so you don't have to spend the 1000 gold if you don't want.
- I also plan to make even more versions of the spell , and possibly make a grenade spell along too.
- As I a'm a new creator I would like to make people happy so feel free to submit ideas so I can improve this mod Please try to keep it easy because again i'm new to the creation kit.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
Uninstalling:
With the new update if you have the old version you can just go into the data files , and delete the file .

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
author: Funinabox900
